snippet: Two former New York City officials have admitted taking bribes, becoming the latest people connected to the housing department to fall in a continuing corruption investigation.
abstract: Former New York City housing officials Michael Provenzano and Luis Adorno plead guilty to accepting bribes from real estate developers; both men are scheduled for sentencing in December and face a maximum of 10 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Two former New York City officials have admitted taking bribes, becoming the latest people connected to the housing department to fall in a continuing corruption investigation.

headline.seo: 2 Former Housing Officials Plead Guilty in Bribery Schemes
headline.main: Former Housing Officials Plead Guilty to Bribery
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officials For Housing Plead Guilty To Bribery

keywords.value: Department of Housing Preservation and Development (NYC)
keywords.name: organizations
